website_summaries.verdict: A good-looking charging dock by Apple. Although it won't work with all iPhones, it's definitely worth considering if it's compatible with your phone and you prefer Apple products.
pros: Has a minimalist, contemporary design and sturdy build
Metallic finish has a sleek look, and comes in several colors
Compatible with most Generation 5 and newer iPhones, iPads, and iPods
Decent price point for an Apple product
cons: If you have a thicker case on your phone, you'll probably have to take it off during charging

customer_reviews.title: No good for me
customer_reviews.text: I have an IPhone 7. The phone has to sit perfectly vertical for the phone to charge. Even a little off kilter and the phone will not charge. There is a space between the phone and base that allows this to happen. I will probably get some cabinet door tabs to build up that space to allow the phone to charge properly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry C.

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Apple Lighting Dock
customer_reviews.text: I saw reviews where some were fakes but when I got mine, it was in the legit apple box and still in the plastic. The paper work was all in there. I have been pleased so far and it works great with my iPhone X. I also like it was much cheaper than buying it directly from Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Jerald

customer_reviews.title: this was the perfect dock to put bedside to both hold my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I got rid of my alarm clock and started using the alarm on my phone instead, this was the perfect dock to put bedside to both hold my phone upright and charge at the same time. Charging cord plugs into the back of the dock and the phone sits on top.
customer_reviews.author: C.Grider

customer_reviews.title: This is original

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Ought to mention that it can be a little finicky when attempting to place the iPhone 7 in position. Pin is small and phone is large. Take care not to force and bend anything the wrong way:) We connect this to our old Bose sound system radio/CD player. The dock connects to the Bose, and the new phone has a large enough capacity for our music library. So for relatively little expense we have extended the life of our family room sound system, and have a charging dock to boot:)

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing

customer_reviews.title: Love my iPhone dock
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted one of these docks as I was jealous of my mom having one for a few months, and I am very happy with the purchase! Works great and looks nice. The headphone port is also a nice touch. Perfect for a side table in a bedroom, or to have in kitchen. Makes using the "Hey Siri" iPhone feature nice to use while cooking. Pretty much everyone who has seen it has complimented it!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Syl

customer_reviews.title: This thing pretty much does what it says
customer_reviews.text: This thing pretty much does what it says. Plug in your phone, electricity happens. The connector is weird in that it's the only thing supporting the phone, so if trouble brews in the room you set this up in, you might end up with a broken doodad or thingamajig. Other than that, there is an extra plug for audio out, which maybe works to make audio go out, but I've not used it because who does that.
customer_reviews.author: Persons Personating.

customer_reviews.title: Apple quality, Apple flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is an original Apple product. It has a very good built quality and works just fine. I would prefer something more flexible in termos of inclination. Your cell will be pretty much straight - difficult to see when you're seated and your cell at desk. If you use that dock in nightstand it is just fine (by the way, for those: it is hard to fit in when it is dark).

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone Lightning Dock - Space Gray
feature_bullets: Your iPhone sits upright in the dock as it syncs or charges, so it’s perfect for a desk or countertop
The iPhone Lightning Dock features an audio line-out port that connects to powered speakers. It supports headphones that include a remote control
You can even conduct speakerphone calls with your iPhone in the dock
USB Cable and Power Adapter sold separately
